title: SALE PENDING 1889 Tobin Baby Kelly for Sale
author: aelefson

posts.post_title: SALE PENDING 1889 Tobin Baby Kelly for Sale
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING
Hi-

Scanned below are three trade cards from the 1889 Tobin baby set.  Baby Kelly is supposed to be Mike King Kelly.  All three have advertising on the back and front for Emerson Piano and the Kelly has an agent stamp on the front from Rutland Vermont.  

200.00 delivered for all three.  Please let me know if you have any questions, need better scans, or would like to purchase them.
SALE PENDING  

Alan
[url]aelefson@hotmail.com[/url]
I will take these if still available

Excellent.  They are yours.  I will mark these as sale pending.  I sent a PM as well.

Thanks,
Alan
